projects.title: Back Propagation
projects.description: Back Propagation implemented in C++ with CUDA with no external libraries
details: Optimized CUDA kernels to train multilayer backpropagation neural networks.
Supports variable layer sizes, number of layers, activation functions, learning rates, batch sizes.

projects.title: Ray Tracing
projects.description: Ray Tracing implemented in C++ and includes a GUI
details: Implements ray tracing algorithms to render 3D scenes with realistic lighting and shadows.
Has a terminal-based UI to see render progress.
Has a GUI to view partially rendered images in real-time.

media.alt: Ray traced render of reflective spheres

projects.title: 1brc
projects.description: Parsing text in Java 38x faster than the baseline
details: Parses 1 Billion lines in under 6 seconds.
Uses multithreading to split the 11GB input file to parse in parallel.
Optimized memory management to reduce garbage collection overhead.

projects.title: Learn Linear Algebra
projects.description: A website with detailed notes for Georgia Tech's Linear Algebra
details: Comprehensive notes covering all topics in the course.
Includes interactive examples and visualizations to aid understanding.
Has helped many students excel in the course.
